text: Naat is poetry that speaks well of the Islamic prophet Muhammad. Some famous scholars in the early days of Islam wrote Naat. People who recite Naat are known as Naat-Khawan or Sanaa Khawan. The practice is popular in South Asia in India and Pakistan. Naat is often recited in Punjabi, Sindhi, or the Urdu language. ==References== ==Other websites== * Poetry Soup - Examples of Naat Poems * Online Naat Category:Poetry Category:Islamic texts
title: Naat
